document.text:
From: 
To: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Cc: Christian Everdell , Laura Mennin er 
, Jeff 
Pagliuca 
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] 'Boles Articles 
Date: Fri, 26 Nov 2021 19:32:03 +0000 
Counsel, 
This afternoon, we spoke with David Boies and Sigrid McCawley, counsel fo about the articles 
you sent. David and Sigrid informed us that the reporting you flagged regardin :4 is incorrect. has 
no intention of providing any press briefings during the upcoming trial, and her attorneys similarly have no intention of 
providing any such briefings or any other commentary to the press during trial. David and Sigrid both confirmed that they 
have complied and intend to continue complying with SDNY Local Rule 23.1. 
Thank you for raising the issue, and please let us know if there is anything else you would like to discuss in advance of 
Monday. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew% Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM <E> 
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 2021 5:56 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] /Boies Articles 
Attached are the articles we referenced during today's call: 
EFTA00016492

Please note my new office address and preferred email address: 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
Main 
Cell: 
Fax: 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim that may be 
confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this 
message. Thank you. 
EFTA00016493
